Question 15 
 
 
Power System 
 
The valid positive, negative and zero sequence impedance (in p.u.), respectively, for a 220 kV, fully 
transposed three-phase transmission line, from the given choices are 
 
 
(A) 0.15, 0.15 and 0.35 
(B) 0.2, 0.2 and 0.2 
 
(C) 1.1, 0.15 and 0.08 
(D) 0.1, 0.3 and 0.1

A
